author: dirkx
msg: Addition of a test script which creates a Sample/test configuration for installations
that wants to support SNI. Primarily done as a lot of web developers find the creation
of certificates hard - and do not want to go to the expense of sourcing a handful
from a well-known CA just for testing and experimenting.
Also update the CHANGES log with the word 'SNI' as to make googling it easier.

author: snoopdave
msg: Merging fix for disable custom themes from trunk

author: skitching
msg: Add simple master/detail example without persistence.

author: vamsic007
msg: GERONIMO-3837 allowLinking Tomcat atttibute in StandardContext not configurable through Geronimo
o Enabling this attribute per server instance using a system property org.apache.geronimo.tomcat.GeronimoStandardContext.allowLinking
